18%, from 2.9% to 2.4%. In Zambia, the all-

The reduction of CFR in non-EmONC 
facilities was even higher, declining by 75% 
in Uganda (from 3.2% to 0.78%) and by 24% 
in Zambia (from 2% to 1.5%). (See Appendix
